item.title: PermX
item.description: INTRODUCTION PermX is about exploiting a learning management system called Chamilo. The box was pretty easy, and shouldn’t take long to finish. Recon mostly involves uncovering a couple subdomains. One of them is the usual, obvious subdomain, but the other is a bit more odd. Accessing the “more odd” subdomain allows you to know the name of the CMS you’re up against. Applying a little directory enumeration will reveal that you can actually access several directories in “file browser” mode, basically eliminating the need to do any file enumeration.
